Test Piece Contest
Der Wildschütz [arr. Godfrey Jr.]
Honley, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £17, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £, 5th £3. March contest -1st Hinchliffe Mill, 2nd Brighouse and Rastrick. 7 bands competed.
